tests.title: UAT: Expense CRUD with sync validation

steps.label: Record expense count from both Windows and mobile apps, ensure mobile is on WiFi. NOTE: HomeBudget UI will close automatically during each CLI operation and reopen when complete.
Create test expense
steps.command: hb expense add --date 2026-02-17 --category "Food (Basic)" --subcategory "Cheap restaurant" --amount 25.50 --account "TWH - Personal" --notes "UAT Expense Create 01"

steps.label: Verify: New expense appears in Windows app AND mobile app
Verify: Expense details match what was entered
Verify: Updated expense appears in Windows app AND mobile app
Verify: Expense removed from Windows app AND mobile app

tests.title: UAT: Income CRUD with sync validation

steps.label: Record income count from both Windows and mobile apps, ensure mobile is on WiFi. NOTE: HomeBudget UI will close automatically during each CLI operation and reopen when complete.
Create test income
steps.command: hb income add --date 2026-02-17 --name "Profit and Loss" --amount 1000.00 --account "TWH IB USD" --notes UAT_Income_Create_01

steps.label: Verify SyncUpdate created with AddIncome operation
Verify: New income (1000 USD) appears in Windows app AND mobile app
Verify: Income details match what was entered
Verify: Updated income appears in Windows app AND mobile app
Verify: Income removed from Windows app AND mobile app

tests.title: UAT: Transfer CRUD with sync validation

steps.label: Record transfer count from both Windows and mobile apps, ensure mobile is on WiFi
Create test transfer
steps.command: hb transfer add --date 2026-02-17 --from-account "TWH - Personal" --to-account "30 CC Hashemis" --amount 100.00 --notes "UAT Transfer Create 01"

steps.label: Verify: New transfer appears in Windows app AND mobile app
Verify: Transfer details match what was entered
Verify: Updated transfer appears in Windows app AND mobile app
Verify: Transfer removed from Windows app AND mobile app

tests.title: UAT: Expense CRUD with USD foreign currency

steps.label: Ensure mobile app is on WiFi and synced
Create expense in USD foreign currency
steps.command: hb expense add --date 2026-02-17 --category "Food (Basic)" --subcategory "Cheap restaurant" --amount 25.50 --currency USD --currency-amount 27.50 --account "TWH - Personal" --notes "UAT Currency Test 01 - USD 27.50"

steps.label: Verify: New expense appears in Windows app with currency info AND appears on mobile app
Read expense and verify currency fields
Verify: Currency=USD and currencyAmount=27.50 are preserved in the record
Verify: Currency expense removed from Windows app AND mobile app

tests.title: UAT: Income CRUD with SGD foreign currency (forex)

steps.label: Record income count from both Windows and mobile apps, ensure mobile is on WiFi
Create income in SGD foreign currency with conversion
steps.command: hb income add --date 2026-02-17 --name "Profit and Loss" --amount 2000.00 --currency SGD --currency-amount 2700.00 --account "TWH IB USD" --notes SGD_conversion

steps.label: Verify SyncUpdate created with forex fields
Verify: New income appears in Windows app with currency conversion (2000 SGD, 2700 USD) AND appears on mobile app
Read forex income and verify currency fields
Verify: Currency=SGD, amount=2000.00, currencyAmount=2700.00 are preserved in the record
Verify SyncUpdate created for forex delete
Verify: Forex income removed from Windows app AND mobile app

tests.title: UAT: Transfer CRUD with USD foreign currency

steps.label: Record transfer count from both Windows and mobile apps, ensure mobile is on WiFi
Create transfer in USD foreign currency
steps.command: hb transfer add --date 2026-02-17 --from-account "TWH - Personal" --to-account "30 CC Hashemis" --amount 100.00 --currency USD --currency-amount 110.00 --notes "UAT Currency Test 01 - USD 110.00"

steps.label: Verify: New transfer appears in Windows app with currency info AND appears on mobile app
Read transfer and verify currency fields
Verify: Currency=USD and currencyAmount=110.00 are preserved in the record

tests.title: UAT: Batch import CSV with sync validation

steps.label: Record expense count from both Windows and mobile apps, ensure mobile is on WiFi
Create sample CSV file
steps.command:
cat > /tmp/batch_test.csv << 'EOF'
type,date,account,category,subcategory,amount,notes,to_account
expense,2026-02-17,TWH - Personal,Food (Basic),Cheap restaurant,15.00,Batch test 01,
expense,2026-02-17,TWH - Personal,Food (Basic),Cheap restaurant,12.50,Batch test 02,
income,2026-02-17,TWH - Personal,Salary and Wages,,500.00,Batch test income 01,

EOF

steps.label: Verify: All 4 transactions appear in Windows app AND mobile app after sync
